resources.string:
"Welcome to the AnimalDex help section. This app is designed to provide a guideline to help" "identify land mammals.
 The results returned are not guaranteed to be correct. To begin" "identifying an animal please select the identify animal button from the main menu and" "answer the questions as best you can.
 You can view your sighting history and the location" "of each entry through the sighting history menu, also accessible from the main menu. If you" "have any questions or concerns about the product, or any bugs to report, please contact one" "one of the following:

" "Lucas Bongers - bongerlj@mcmaster.ca
 Alexander Jackson - jacksa2@mcmaster.ca
 Harit Patel - patelhp3@mcmaster.ca
 Josh Voskamp - voskamjp@mcmaster.ca
 Mohammad Naveed - naveedmu@mcmaster.ca

"
"Release Log:

" "Version 1.0: Initial release with full Google Maps support and 70 animals in the database"
